columns.text: Comfortable and welcoming paradises in Imerovigli, the suites with private patio and outdoor jacuzzi can accommodate 2 people in their spacious premises. Enjoy the sea view and the daily sun’s journey on the sky as well as hours of relaxation at the private jacuzzi. The state of art bathrooms, the elegantly decorated living room and the fine mattresses complete the “Santorini come true” holiday experience.
Up to 2 Guests/ Sea View
